quote: The stars glittered in the sky and as the number of people at the party grew there were merging conversations and laughter and bodies moving in outlines around the kegs of beer in a curtsy of youth.
quote_letters: THE STARS GLITTERED IN THE SKY AND AS THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE AT THE PARTY GREW THERE WERE MERGING CONVERSATIONS AND LAUGHTER AND BODIES MOVING IN OUTLINES AROUND THE KEGS OF BEER IN A CURTSY OF YOUTH
